{{title|使用多态分配器的容器便利别名 {{mark since libfund ts}}}}
{{cpp/experimental/lib extensions/pmr/navbar}}

下列使用多态分配器的容器便利别名和别名模板，定义于 {{tt|std::experimental::pmr}} 命名空间。

=== 字符串===
{{dsc begin}}
{{dsc hitem | 别名/别名模板|所别名者}} 
{{dsc header | experimental/string}}
{{cpp/experimental/pmr_container|basic_string|tpdecl=class CharT,
         class Traits=std::char_traits&lt;CharT&gt;|tpargs=CharT, Traits|allocargs=CharT|multiline=yes}}
{{cpp/experimental/pmr_container_special|string|basic_string|char}}
{{cpp/experimental/pmr_container_special|wstring|basic_string|wchar_t}}
{{cpp/experimental/pmr_container_special|u16string|basic_string|char16_t}}
{{cpp/experimental/pmr_container_special|u32string|basic_string|char32_t}}
{{dsc end }}

=== 序列容器===
{{dsc begin}}
{{dsc hitem | 别名模板|所别名者}} 
{{dsc header | experimental/vector}}
{{cpp/experimental/pmr_container|vector}}

{{dsc header | experimental/deque }}
{{cpp/experimental/pmr_container|deque}}

{{dsc header | experimental/forward_list}}
{{cpp/experimental/pmr_container|forward_list}}

{{dsc header | experimental/list}}
{{cpp/experimental/pmr_container|list}}
{{dsc end}}

=== 关联容器===
{{dsc begin}}
{{dsc hitem | 别名模板|所别名者}} 
{{dsc header | experimental/map}}
{{cpp/experimental/pmr_container|map|tpdecl=class Key, class T, 
         class Compare=std::less&lt;Key&gt;|tpargs=Key, T, Compare|allocargs=std::pair&lt;const Key, T&gt;|multiline=yes}}
{{cpp/experimental/pmr_container|multimap|tpdecl=class Key, class T, 
         class Compare=std::less&lt;Key&gt;|tpargs=Key, T, Compare|allocargs=std::pair&lt;const Key, T&gt;|multiline=yes}}

{{dsc header | experimental/set}}
{{cpp/experimental/pmr_container|set|tpdecl=class Key,
         class Compare=std::less&lt;Key&gt;|tpargs=Key, Compare|allocargs=Key|multiline=yes}}
{{cpp/experimental/pmr_container|multiset|tpdecl=class Key,
         class Compare=std::less&lt;Key&gt;|tpargs=Key, Compare|allocargs=Key|multiline=yes}}
{{dsc end}}

=== 无序关联容器===
{{dsc begin}}
{{dsc hitem | 别名模板|所别名者}} 

{{dsc header | experimental/unordered_map}}
{{cpp/experimental/pmr_container|unordered_map|tpdecl=class Key, class T, 
         class Hash = std::hash&lt;Key&gt;, 
         class Pred = std::equal_to&lt;Key&gt;|tpargs=Key, T, Hash, Pred|allocargs=std::pair&lt;const Key, T&gt;|multiline=yes}}
{{cpp/experimental/pmr_container|unordered_multimap|tpdecl=class Key, class T, 
         class Hash = std::hash&lt;Key&gt;, 
         class Pred = std::equal_to&lt;Key&gt;|tpargs=Key, T, Hash, Pred|allocargs=std::pair&lt;const Key, T&gt;|multiline=yes}}

{{dsc header | experimental/unordered_set}}
{{cpp/experimental/pmr_container|unordered_set|tpdecl=class Key, 
         class Hash = std::hash&lt;Key&gt;, 
         class Pred = std::equal_to&lt;Key&gt;|tpargs=Key, Hash, Pred|allocargs=Key|multiline=yes}}
{{cpp/experimental/pmr_container|unordered_multiset|tpdecl=class Key, 
         class Hash = std::hash&lt;Key&gt;, 
         class Pred = std::equal_to&lt;Key&gt;|tpargs=Key, Hash, Pred|allocargs=Key|multiline=yes}}
{{dsc end}}

==={{tt|match_results}}===
{{dsc begin}}
{{dsc hitem | 别名/别名模板|所别名者}} 
{{dsc header | experimental/regex}}
{{cpp/experimental/pmr_container|match_results|tpdecl=class BidirIt
|tpargs=BidirIt|allocargs=std::sub_match&lt;BidirIt&gt;|multiline=yes}}
{{cpp/experimental/pmr_container_special|cmatch|match_results|const char*}}
{{cpp/experimental/pmr_container_special|wcmatch|match_results|const wchar_t*}}
{{cpp/experimental/pmr_container_special|smatch|match_results|pmr::string::const_iterator}}
{{cpp/experimental/pmr_container_special|wsmatch|match_results|pmr::wstring::const_iterator}}
{{dsc end}}
